text: allahu nervaliyilakkunnavan matraman sanmargam prapiccavan. avan durmargattilakappetuttunnavarkk avanekkutate oru raksakaneyum ninakku kantettanavilla. uyirttelunnelpu nalil namavare mukham nilattu kutti valiccilacc keantuvarum. avarappeal andharum umakalum badhirarumayirikkum. avarute sanketam narakaman. atile agni anayumpealeakke namat alikkattikkum
